name: Moe Jump! Yukitsuki ver.
description:
An irresistibly adorable jump-rope action game

Tap & swipe to chain combos!

Obtain points to unlock gallery illustrations!


Featuring Yukitsuki from Fragment's Note (VN)! She'll give it her (Moe Jump!) all, so help her out!
Unlock exclusive illustrations by completing play objectives!

Shall we "Moe Jump" back to that special time?
